00016 /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00017  * File:    mfan.h
00018  * Author:  GeorgeV
00019  * Purpose: header file for the Multi-file Annotation Interface
00020  * Invokes: 
00021  * Contents:
00022  *          Structure definitions: ANnode, ANentry
00023  *          Constant definitions:  AN_DATA_LABEL, AN_DATA_DESC
00024  *          (-moved to hdf.h)      AN_FILE_LABEL, AN_FILE_DESC
00025  *
00026  *----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00027

00035 #if 0
00036 /* enumerated types of the varous annotation types 
00037  * NOTE: moved to hdf.h since they are used by end users. */
00038 typedef enum 
00039 { 
00040   AN_DATA_LABEL = 0, /* Data label */
00041   AN_DATA_DESC,      /* Data description */
00042   AN_FILE_LABEL,     /* File label */
00043   AN_FILE_DESC       /* File description */
00044 } ann_type;
00045 #endif

00047 #if defined MFAN_MASTER | defined MFAN_TESTER
00048 /* WE ARE IN MAIN ANNOTATION SOURCE FILE "mfan.c" */
00049 
00050 /* PRIVATE variables and definitions */
00051 
00052 /* This sturcture is used to find which file the annotation belongs to
00053  * and use the subsequent file specific annotation 'key' to find the 
00054  * annotation. The annotation atom group(ANIDGROUP) keeps track of 
00055  * all anotations across the file. */
00056 typedef struct ANnode
00057 {
00058   int32   file_id;  /* which file this annotation belongs to */
00059   int32   ann_key;  /* type/ref: used to find annotation in corresponding
00060                        TBBT in filerec_t->tree[]. */
00061   intn    new_ann;  /* flag */
00062 } ANnode;
00063 
00064 /*
00065  * This structure is an entry in the label/desc tree
00066  * for a label/desc in the file, it gives the ref of the label/desc,
00067  * and the tag/ref of the data item to which the label/desc relates 
00068  * The filerec_t->an_tree[] TBBT members will contain these entries.
00069  **/
00070 typedef struct ANentry
00071 {
00072   int32   ann_id;      /* annotation id */
00073   uint16  annref;      /* ref of annotation */
00074   uint16  elmtag;      /* tag of data */
00075   uint16  elmref;      /* ref of data */
00076 } ANentry;
00077 
00078 
00079 /* This is the size of the hash tables used for annotation IDs */
00080 #define ANATOM_HASH_SIZE    64
00081 
00082 /* Used to create unique 32bit keys from annotation type and reference number 
00083  *  This key is used to add nodes to a corresponding TBBT in 
00084  *  filrerec_t->an_tree[]. 
00085  *  ----------------------------
00086  *  | type(16bits) | ref(16bits) |
00087  *  -----------------------------*/
00088 #define AN_CREATE_KEY(t,r) ((((int32)t & 0xffff) << 16) | r)
00089 
00090 /* Obtain Reference number from key */
00091 #define AN_KEY2REF(k)      ((uint16)((int32)k & 0xffff))
00092 
00093 /* Obtain Annotation type from key */
00094 #define AN_KEY2TYPE(k)     ((int32)((int32)k >> 16))
00095 
00096 #else /* !defined MFAN_MASTER && !defined MFAN_TESTER */
00097 /* WE are NOT in main ANNOTATION source file
00098  * Nothing EXPORTED except Public fcns */
00099

00101 /******************************************************************************
00102  NAME
00103    ANstart - open file for annotation handling
00104 
00105  DESCRIPTION
00106    Start annotation handling on the file return a annotation ID to the file.
00107 
00108  RETURNS
00109    A file ID or FAIL.
00110 *******************************************************************************/
00111 HDFLIBAPI int32 ANstart(int32 file_id /* IN: file to start annotation access on */);
00112 
00113 /******************************************************************************
00114  NAME
00115    ANfileinfo - Report high-level information about the ANxxx interface for a given file.
00116 
00117  DESCRIPTION
00118    Reports general information about the number of file and object(i.e. data)
00119    annotations in the file. This routine is generally used to find
00120    the range of acceptable indices for ANselect calls.
00121 
00122  RETURNS
00123    Returns SUCCEED if successful and FAIL othewise
00124 
00125 *******************************************************************************/
00126 HDFLIBAPI intn  ANfileinfo(int32 an_id,         /* IN:  annotation interface id */
00127                         int32 *n_file_label, /* OUT: the # of file labels */
00128                         int32 *n_file_desc,  /* OUT: the # of file descriptions */
00129                         int32 *n_obj_label,  /* OUT: the # of object labels */ 
00130                         int32 *n_obj_desc    /* OUT: the # of object descriptions */);
00131 
00132 /******************************************************************************
00133  NAME
00134    ANend - End annotation access to file file
00135 
00136  DESCRIPTION
00137    End annotation access to file.
00138 
00139  RETURNS
00140    SUCCEED if successful and  FAIL otherwise.
00141 *******************************************************************************/
00142 HDFLIBAPI int32 ANend(int32 an_id /* IN: Annotation ID of file to close */);
00143 
00144 /******************************************************************************
00145  NAME
00146    ANcreate - create a new element annotation and return a handle(id)
00147 
00148  DESCRIPTION
00149    Creates a data annotation, returns an 'an_id' to work with the new 
00150    annotation which can either be a label or description.
00151    Valid annotation types are AN_DATA_LABEL for data labels and 
00152    AN_DATA_DESC for data descriptions.
00153 
00154  RETURNS
00155         An ID to an annotation which can either be a label or description.
00156 *******************************************************************************/
00157 HDFLIBAPI int32 ANcreate(int32 an_id,     /* IN: annotation interface ID */
00158                       uint16 elem_tag, /* IN: tag of item to be assigned annotation */
00159                       uint16 elem_ref, /* IN: reference number of itme to be assigned ann*/
00160                       ann_type type    /* IN: annotation type */);
00161 
00162 
00163 /******************************************************************************
00164  NAME
00165     ANcreatef - create a new file annotation and return a handle(id)
00166 
00167  DESCRIPTION
00168     Creates a file annotation, returns an 'an_id' to work with the new 
00169     file annotation which can either be a label or description.
00170     Valid annotation types are AN_FILE_LABEL for file labels and
00171     AN_FILE_DESC for file descritpions.
00172 
00173  RETURNS
00174         An ID to an annotation which can either be a file label or description
00175 *******************************************************************************/
00176 HDFLIBAPI int32 ANcreatef(int32 an_id,  /* IN: annotation interface ID */
00177                        ann_type type /* IN:  annotation type */);
00178 
00179 /******************************************************************************
00180  NAME
00181     ANselect - get an annotation ID from index of 'type'
00182 
00183  DESCRIPTION
00184     Get an annotation Id from index of 'type'.
00185     The position index is ZERO based
00186 
00187  RETURNS
00188     An ID to an annotation type which can either be a label or description 
00189 *******************************************************************************/
00190 HDFLIBAPI int32 ANselect(int32 an_id,  /* IN: annotation interface ID */
00191                       int32 index,  /* IN: index of annottion to get ID for */
00192                       ann_type type /* IN: annotation type */);
00193 
00194 /******************************************************************************
00195  NAME
00196    ANnumann - find number of annotation of 'type' that  match the given element tag/ref 
00197 
00198  DESCRIPTION
00199    Find number of annotation of 'type' for the given element 
00200    tag/ref pair.Should not be used for File labels and
00201    descriptions.
00202 
00203  RETURNS
00204    number of annotation found if successful and FAIL (-1) otherwise
00205 
00206 *******************************************************************************/
00207 HDFLIBAPI intn  ANnumann(int32 an_id,     /* IN: annotation interface id */
00208                       ann_type type,   /* IN: annotation type */
00209                       uint16 elem_tag, /* IN: tag of item of which this is annotation */
00210                       uint16 elem_ref  /* IN: ref of item of which this is annotation*/);
00211 
00212 /******************************************************************************
00213  NAME
00214    ANannlist - generate list of annotation ids of 'type' that match the given element tag/ref 
00215 
00216  DESCRIPTION
00217    Find and generate list of annotation ids of 'type' for the given 
00218    element tag/ref pair.Should not be used for File labels and
00219    descriptions.
00220 
00221  RETURNS
00222    number of annotations ids found if successful and FAIL (-1) otherwise
00223 
00224 *******************************************************************************/
00225 HDFLIBAPI intn  ANannlist(int32 an_id,     /* IN: annotation interface id */
00226                        ann_type type,   /* IN: annotation type */
00227                        uint16 elem_tag, /* IN: tag of item of which this is annotation */
00228                        uint16 elem_ref, /* IN: ref of item of which this is annotation*/
00229                        int32 ann_list[] /* OUT: array of ann_id's that match criteria.*/);
00230 
00231 /******************************************************************************
00232  NAME
00233    ANannlen - get length of annotation givne annotation id
00234 
00235  DESCRIPTION
00236    Uses the annotation id to find ann_key & file_id
00237 
00238  RETURNS
00239    length of annotation if successful and FAIL (-1) otherwise
00240 
00241 *******************************************************************************/
00242 HDFLIBAPI int32 ANannlen(int32 ann_id /* IN: annotation id */);
00243 
00244 /******************************************************************************
00245  NAME
00246    ANwriteann - write annotation given ann_id
00247 
00248  DESCRIPTION
00249    Checks for pre-existence of given annotation, replacing old one if it
00250    exists. Writes out annotation.
00251 
00252  RETURNS
00253    SUCCEED (0) if successful and FAIL (-1) otherwise
00254 
00255 *******************************************************************************/
00256 HDFLIBAPI int32 ANwriteann(int32 ann_id,    /* IN: annotation id */
00257                         const char *ann, /* IN: annotation to write */
00258                         int32 annlen     /* IN: length of annotation*/);
00259 
00260 /******************************************************************************
00261  NAME
00262    ANreadann - read annotation given ann_id
00263 
00264  DESCRIPTION
00265    Gets tag and ref of annotation.  Finds DD for that annotation.
00266    Reads the annotation, taking care of NULL terminator, if necessary.
00267 
00268  RETURNS
00269    SUCCEED (0) if successful and FAIL (-1) otherwise
00270 
00271 *******************************************************************************/
00272 HDFLIBAPI int32 ANreadann(int32 ann_id, /* IN: annotation id (handle) */
00273                        char *ann,    /* OUT: space to return annotation in */
00274                        int32 maxlen  /* IN: size of space to return annotation in */);
00275 
00276 /******************************************************************************
00277  NAME
00278     ANendaccess - end access to an annotation given it's id
00279 
00280  DESCRIPTION
00281     Terminates access to an annotation. For now does nothing
00282 
00283  RETURNS
00284     SUCCEED(0) or FAIL(-1)
00285 *******************************************************************************/
00286 HDFLIBAPI intn  ANendaccess(int32 ann_id /* IN: annotation id */);
00287 
00288 /******************************************************************************
00289  NAME
00290    ANget_tagref - get tag/ref pair for annotation based on type and index
00291 
00292  DESCRIPTION
00293    Get the tag/ref of the annotation based on  the type and index of the 
00294    annotation. The position index is zero based
00295 
00296  RETURNS
00297    A tag/ref pairt to an annotation type which can either be a 
00298    label or description.
00299 
00300 *******************************************************************************/
00301 HDFLIBAPI int32 ANget_tagref(int32 an_id,    /* IN: annotation interface ID */
00302                           int32 index,    /* IN: index of annotation to get tag/ref for*/
00303                           ann_type type,  /* IN: annotation type */
00304                           uint16 *ann_tag,/* OUT: Tag for annotation */ 
00305                           uint16 *ann_ref /* OUT: ref for annotation */);
00306 
00307 /******************************************************************************
00308  NAME
00309    ANid2tagref -- get tag/ref given annotation id
00310 
00311  DESCRIPTION
00312    Uses the annotation id to find ann_node entry which contains ann_ref
00313 
00314  RETURNS
00315    SUCCEED(0) if successful and FAIL (-1) otherwise. 
00316 *******************************************************************************/
00317 HDFLIBAPI int32 ANid2tagref(int32 ann_id,    /* IN: annotation id */
00318                          uint16 *ann_tag, /* OUT: Tag for annotation */
00319                          uint16 *ann_ref  /* OUT: ref for annotation */);
00320 
00321 /******************************************************************************
00322  NAME
00323    ANtagref2id -- get annotation id given tag/ref
00324 
00325  DESCRIPTION
00326    Gets the annotation id of the annotation given the tag/ref of
00327    the annotation itself and the annotation interface id.
00328 
00329  RETURNS
00330    Annotation id of annotation if successful and FAIL(-1) otherwise. 
00331 *******************************************************************************/
00332 HDFLIBAPI int32 ANtagref2id(int32 an_id,    /* IN  Annotation interface id */
00333                          uint16 ann_tag, /* IN: Tag for annotation */
00334                          uint16 ann_ref  /* IN: ref for annotation */);
00335 
00336 /******************************************************************************
00337  NAME
00338    ANatype2tag - annotation type to corresponding annotation TAG
00339 
00340  DESCRIPTION
00341    Translate annotation type to corresponding TAG.
00342 
00343  RETURNS
00344    Returns TAG corresponding to annotatin type.
00345 *******************************************************************************/
00346 HDFLIBAPI uint16 ANatype2tag(ann_type atype /* IN: Annotation type */);
00347 
00348 /******************************************************************************
00349  NAME
00350    ANtag2atype - annotation TAG to corresponding annotation type
00351 
00352  DESCRIPTION
00353    Translate annotation TAG to corresponding atype
00354 
00355  RETURNS
00356    Returns type corresponding to annotatin TAG.
00357 *******************************************************************************/
00358 HDFLIBAPI ann_type ANtag2atype(uint16 atag /* IN: annotation tag */);
